tool.name: IGV
tool.command:
#import re mkdir -p ./igv/data && mkdir -p ./igv/output &&
#set $input_cleaned_name = re.sub('[^\w\-\.\s]', '_', str($input.element_identifier)) ln -sf '$input' './igv/data/${input_cleaned_name}.${input.ext}' &&
#if $index: #set $index_cleaned_name = re.sub('[^\w\-\.\s]', '_', str($index.element_identifier)) ln -sf '$index' './igv/data/${index_cleaned_name}.${index.ext}' && #end if
#if $cytoband: #set $cytoband_cleaned_name = re.sub('[^\w\-\.\s]', '_', str($cytoband.element_identifier)) ln -sf '$cytoband' './igv/data/${cytoband_cleaned_name}.${cytoband.ext}' && #end if
#for $track in $tracks: #set $tracks_list = list() #set $track_cleaned_name = re.sub('[^\w\-\.\s]', '_', str($track.element_identifier)) ln -sf '$track' './igv/data/${track_cleaned_name}.${track.ext}' && $tracks_list.append('./igv/data/${trackfile}') #end for
#if $igv_session.add_session == "true": #set $cleaned_session_name = re.sub('[^\w\-\.\s]', '_', str($session.element_identifier)) ln -sf '$session' './igv/data/${cleaned_session_name}.${session.ext}' && #end if
igv --host '0.0.0.0' --port 5000 --gxit --input './igv/data/${input_cleaned_name}.${input.ext}' #if $index: --index './igv/data/${index_cleaned_name}.${index.ext}' #end if #if $cytoband: --cytoband './igv/data/${cytoband_cleaned_name}.${cytoband.ext}' #end if --dump-session './igv/output/igv-session.json' #if $tracks_list: --tracks #for $track in $tracks_list: '#echo $track#' #end for #end if #if $igv_session.add_session == "true": --igv-session './igv/data/${cleaned_session_name}.${session.ext}' #end if #if $run_it == "true": --run-it #end if &&
cp './igv/output/igv-session.json' '$out_igv_session'

param.name: add_session
param.label: Add IGV session
param.help: If selected, allows to resume a IGV session

param.name: run_it
param.label: Execute the tool and return a session.

tool.help:
This interactive tool integrates `igv.js`, which is an embeddable interactive genome visualization component developed by the Integrative Genomics Viewer (IGV_) team.
Please visit the official GitHub repository_ for additional information about `igv.js`.
.. _IGV: https://igv.org/ .. _repository: https://github.com/igvteam/igv.js
